We do n't want to make a movie which makes me a hero or glamorizes me , it is more about journey so that people can relate to it because we all go through almost the same thing . Everybody does n't play for India but attend of the day to reach your mark you have to struggle in life and it 's all circumstantial small design that you have to make that actually have a big impact in life . So , it 's all about that small things . Yes , people know a lot about me . I played football . I was from particular school . I got a job with railways and moved on in all of that but what happens in between that is what really pushes me or transforms me to what actually i am today . So , the movie is more about the journey and how i deal with everything because i keep saying """""""""""""""""""""" be in the present , be in the present . Jay Shree Krishna , our Parents from African countries at some stage of their lives surrendered Indian Nationality and become British Subjects . When I applied for OCI Overseas Citizen Of India with my British Passport and Uganda born Birth Certificate the application was turned down saying that they required an Indian Document saying that either one of my Parents or I are Indian Born and my parents British passports stating that they were Indian Born were not acceptable . My father wrote to Delhi Indian Home Office to send either proof or his original Passport he surrendered 3 years ago but have not received any reply . What is annoying is most of the community leaders know of the difficulty but despite attending meetings and function with Indian High Commissioner and the staff none have raised the issue that it is very unfair to discard completely a British Passport stating that the person is born in India . Furthermore , why is it impossible receive either surrendered passport or proof that my father was an Indian Citizen before becoming British Citizen . Please share if you have faced this problem .

By this time your eyes will be super red watering and dark black tears will be running down your face , this is when you lean on his desk and pathetically tell the prof you have acute contagious viral conjunctivitis and you are very sorry that you couldn't attend the endsem . By this time your eyes will be blood red burning and tears will be streaming onto the prof's desk , he will jump back in fear of contamination and scream at you to get the fuck out of his office . Of course you need to do all this in less than 30 seconds , because that's when the eye drops have finished their initial burning effect and your eyes now feel cool and heavenly peaceful ( careful the fucking drops are addictive ) and the redness goes away .
